data.name: CannotDelete.Text
data.value: 您不能删除该规则，因为这会导致当前IP地址被锁定。

data.name: DefaultAuthProvider.Text
data.value: 默认身份验证提供程序

data.name: DefaultAuthProvider.Help
data.value: 您可以选择用户登录的默认身份验证提供程序。只能选择支持表单身份验证的提供者。

data.name: plAdministrator.Help
data.value: 主要管理员将接收成员活动的电子邮件通知。

data.name: Redirect_AfterLogin.Help
data.value: （可选）选择用户在成功登录后将被重定向到的页面。

data.name: Redirect_AfterLogout.Help
data.value: 可以选择在注销时用户将被重定向到的页面。

data.name: Security_RequireValidProfileAtLogin.Help
data.value: 如果修改了有效配置文件所需的字段，请选中此框以要求用户在登录之前更新其配置文件。

data.name: Security_RequireValidProfileAtLogin.Text
data.value: 需要有效的配置文件才能登录

data.name: Security_CaptchaLogin.Help
data.value: 选中此框以使用CAPTCHA关联登录。例如。 OpenID，LiveID，CardSpace

data.name: Security_CaptchaRetrivePassword.Help
data.value: 选中此框可在检索密码时使用验证码。

data.name: Security_CaptchaChangePassword.Help
data.value: 选中此框以使用CAPTCHA更改密码。

data.name: plHideLoginControl.Help
data.value: 选中此框可隐藏页面中的登录链接。

data.name: BasicLoginSettingsError
data.value: 无法更新登录设置。请稍后再试。

data.name: DeleteError.Text
data.value: 无法删除IP过滤器。请稍后再试。

data.name: IpFilterDeletedWarning.Text
data.value: 您确定要删除此IP过滤器吗？

data.name: plRuleSpecifity.Help
data.value: 确定规则是应用于单个IP地址还是一系列IP地址。

data.name: plRuleType.Help
data.value: 确定此规则是允许还是拒绝访问。

data.name: plFirstIP.Help
data.value: This will either be the single IP to filter, or else will be used with the subnet mask to calculate a range of IP addresses.

data.name: plSubnet.Help
data.value: The subnet mask will be combined with the first IP address to calculate a range of IP addresses for filtering.

data.name: IpFilterUpdateSuccess.Text
data.value: The IP filter has been updated.

data.name: IpFilterUpdateError.Text
data.value: Could not update the IP filter. Please try later.

data.name: IPFiltersDisabled.Text
data.value: Login IP filtering is current disabled. Enable IP address checking under Member Accounts to activate

data.name: IPValidation.ErrorMessage
data.value: Please use a valid IP address/mask.

data.name: LoginSettingsRestoreWarning.Text
data.value: Are you sure you want to cancel your changes?

data.name: SslSettingsRestoreWarning.Text
data.value: Are you sure you want to cancel your changes?

data.name: plResetLinkValidity.Help
data.value: Password reset links are only valid for (in minutes).

data.name: plAdminResetLinkValidity.Help
data.value: Time in minutes that password reset links sent by the Site Administrator will be valid for.

data.name: plEnablePasswordHistory.Help
data.value: Sets whether a list of recently used passwords is maintained and checked to prevent re-use.

data.name: plNumberPasswords.Help
data.value: Enter the number of passwords to store for reuse check

data.name: plPasswordDays.Text
data.value: Number of Days Before Password Reuse

data.name: plPasswordDays.Help
data.value: Enter the length of time, in days, that must pass before a password can be reused

data.name: plEnableBannedList.Help
data.value: Check this box to check passwords against a list of banned items.

data.name: plEnableStrengthMeter.Help
data.value: Sets whether the password strength meter is shown on registration screen

data.name: plEnableIPChecking.Help
data.value: Sets whether IP address is checked during login

data.name: PasswordConfig_PasswordExpiry.Help
data.value: Enter the number of days before a user must change their password. Enter 0 (zero) if the password should never expire.

data.name: PasswordConfig_PasswordExpiryReminder.Help
data.value: Enter the number of days warning users will receive that their password is about to expires.

data.name: MemberSettingsUpdateSuccess.Text
data.value: The member settings has been updated.

data.name: MemberSettingsError.Text
data.value: Could not update the member settings. Please try later.

data.name: SslSettingsUpdateSuccess.Text
data.value: The SSL settings has been updated.

data.name: SslSettingsError.Text
data.value: Could not update the SSL settings. Please try later.

data.name: MemberSettingsRestoreWarning.Text
data.value: Are you sure you want to cancel your changes?

data.name: MembershipResetLinkValidity.ErrorMessage
data.value: Reset link timeouts must be an integer greater than 0 and less than 10000

data.name: AdminMembershipResetLinkValidity.ErrorMessage
data.value: 管理员重置链接超时值必须是大于0且小于10000的整数。

data.name: MembershipNumberPasswords.ErrorMessage
data.value: Number of passwords to store must be an integer greater than or equal to 0 and less than 10000.

data.name: MembershipDaysBeforePasswordReuse.ErrorMessage
data.value: Number of Days Before Password Reuse must be an integer greater than or equal to 0 and less than 10000.

data.name: AutoAccountUnlockDuration.ErrorMessage
data.value: 自动帐户解锁持续时间必须是大于或等于0且小于1000的整数。

data.name: AsyncTimeout.ErrorMessage
data.value: Time before timeout must be an integer greater than or equal to 90 and less than 10000.

data.name: PasswordExpiry.ErrorMessage
data.value: Password expiry must be an integer greater than or equal to 0 and less than 10000.

data.name: PasswordExpiryReminder.ErrorMessage
data.value: Password expiry reminder must be an integer greater than or equal to 0 and less than 10000.

data.name: plUserRegistration.Help
data.value: Select the type of user registration, if any, allowed for this site. Private registration requires users to be authorized by the Site Administrator before gaining access to the Registered Users role. Public registration provides immediate access and Verified registration requires verification of the email address provided.

data.name: NoEmail.Text
data.value: The "Email" field, at minimum, must be included.

data.name: NoDisplayName.Text
data.value: 您已经选择了“需要唯一显示名称”选项，但是您没有在字段列表中包含“显示名称”。

data.name: ContainsDuplicateAddresses.Text
data.value: 本网站的用户群包含重复的电子邮件地址。如果您想使用电子邮件地址作为用户名，则必须先修复这些条目。

data.name: registrationFormTypeLabel.Help
data.value: 选择您要使用的注册表格的类型。

data.name: Security_DisplayNameFormat.Help
data.value: 可以指定显示名称的格式。该格式可以包括用于动态替换的标记，如[FIRSTNAME] [LASTNAME]。如果指定了显示名称格式，则不能再通过用户界面编辑显示名称。

data.name: Security_UserNameValidation.Help
data.value: 添加您自己的验证表达式，用于检查提供的用户名的有效性。如果您更改默认设置，则应更新用户在设置 - 站点设置 - 语言中使用本地化编辑器输入无效用户名时会看到的消息。

data.name: Security_EmailValidation.Help
data.value: 可以选择修改电子邮件验证表达式，该表达式用于检查提供的电子邮件地址的有效性。

data.name: Registration_ExcludeTerms.Help
data.value: 您可以定义用户不能在其用户名或显示名称中使用的用逗号分隔的术语列表。

data.name: Redirect_AfterRegistration.Help
data.value: （可选）选择用户在成功注册后将被重定向到的页面。

data.name: plEnableRegisterNotification.Help
data.value: 选中此框将新用户注册的电子邮件通知发送给主管理员。

data.name: Registration_UseAuthProviders.Help
data.value: 选择此选项可在注册期间使用验证提供程序。请注意，并非所有提供者都支持此选项。

data.name: Registration_UseProfanityFilter.Help
data.value: 选中此框可在注册过程中为用户名和显示名称字段强制执行亵渎过滤器。

data.name: Registration_UseEmailAsUserName.Help
data.value: 选中此框以使用电子邮件地址作为用户名。如果启用此选项，则用户名输入字段将不会显示在注册表单中。

data.name: Registration_UseEmailAsUserName.Text
data.value: 使用电邮地址作为用户名

data.name: Registration_RequireUniqueDisplayName.Help
data.value: 可选地要求用户使用唯一的显示名称。如果用户选择一个已经存在的名字，那么会建议修改后的名称。

data.name: Registration_RandomPassword.Help
data.value: 选中此框可在注册期间生成随机密码，而不是显示密码输入字段。

data.name: Registration_RequireConfirmPassword.Help
data.value: 选中此框可在注册表中显示密码确认框。

data.name: Security_RequireValidProfile.Help
data.value: 如果用户在注册期间必须填写所有必填字段（包括用户名，名字，姓氏，显示名称，电子邮件地址和密码字段），请选中此框。

data.name: Security_RequireValidProfile.Text
data.value: 要求注册有效的配置文件

data.name: Security_CaptchaRegister.Help
data.value: 指出此网站是否应使用CAPTCHA进行注册。

data.name: RequiresUniqueEmail.Help
data.value: 选中此框可要求每个用户提供唯一的电子邮件地址。这可以防止用户使用相同的电子邮件地址多次注册。

data.name: PasswordRetrievalEnabled.Help
data.value: 指示用户是否可以检索其密码。

data.name: PasswordResetEnabledTitle.Help
data.value: 指示用户是否可以请求重置密码。这只能在web.config文件中更改。

data.name: MinNonAlphanumericCharactersTitle.Help
data.value: 指示密码中特殊字符的最小数量。这只能在web.config文件中更改。

data.name: RequiresQuestionAndAnswerTitle.Help
data.value: 指示是否将问题和答案系统用作注册过程的一部分。只能在web.config文件中更改。

data.name: PasswordStrengthRegularExpressionTitle.Help
data.value: 用于评估Provider属性中指定的提供者的密码复杂度的正则表达式。这只能在web.config文件中通过添加/更改AspNetSqlMembershipProvider的passwordStrengthRegularExpression节点来更改。注意:此服务器验证与7.1.0版中引入的密码强度度量工具不同，后者仅建议使用密码强度，而如果定义为)，则此表达式是新密码(的要求。

data.name: MaxInvalidPasswordAttemptsTitle.Help
data.value: 表示在锁定帐户之前可以输入错误密码的次数。这只能在web.config文件中更改。

data.name: PasswordAttemptWindowTitle.Help
data.value: 指示失败登录尝试后帐户被锁定的时间长度。只能在web.config文件中更改。

data.name: RegistrationSettingsUpdateSuccess.Text
data.value: The registration settings has been updated.

data.name: RegistrationSettingsError.Text
data.value: Could not update the registration settings. Please try later.

data.name: RegistrationSettingsRestoreWarning.Text
data.value: Are you sure you want to cancel your changes?

data.name: registrationFieldsLabel.Help
data.value: You can specify the list of fields you want to include as a comma-delimited list. If this setting is used, this will take precedence over the other settings. The possible fields include user name, email, password, confirm password, display name and all the Profile Properties.

data.name: GlobalSettingsTab.Text
data.value: This is a global settings Tab. Changes to the settings will affect all of your sites.

data.name: GlobalSetting.Text
data.value: This is a global setting. Changes to this setting will affect all of your sites.

data.name: plSSLEnabled.Help
data.value: Check the box if an SSL certificate has been installed for use on this site.

data.name: plSSLEnforced.Help
data.value: Check the box if unsecure pages will not be accessible with SSL (HTTPS).

data.name: plSSLURL.Help
data.value: Optionally specify a URL which will be used for secure connections for this site. This is only necessary if you do not have an SSL Certificate installed for your standard site URL. An example would be a shared hosting account where the host provides you with a Shared SSL URL.

data.name: plSTDURL.Help
data.value: If an SSL URL is specified above, then specify the Standard URL for unsecure connections.

data.name: plShowCriticalErrors.Help
data.value: This setting determines if error messages sent via the error querystring parameter should be shown inline in the page.

data.name: plDebugMode.Help
data.value: Check this box to run the installation in "debug mode". This causes various parts of the application to write more verbose error logs etc. Note: This may lead to performance degradation.

data.name: plRememberMe.Text
data.value: Enable Remember Me on Login Control

data.name: plRememberMe.Help
data.value: Check this box to display the Remember Login check box on the login control that allows users to stay logged in for multiple visits.

data.name: plAutoAccountUnlock.Help
data.value: After an account is locked out due to unsuccessful login attempts, it can be automatically unlocked with a successful authentication after a certain period of time has elapsed. Enter the number of minutes to wait until the account can be automatically unlocked. Enter "0" to disable the auto-unlock feature.

data.name: plAsyncTimeout.Help
data.value: Set a value that indicates the time, in seconds, before asynchronous postbacks time out if no response is received, the value should between 90-9999 seconds.

data.name: plMaxUploadSize.Help
data.value: Maximum size of files that can be uploaded to the site. The minimum is 12 MB.

data.name: maxUploadSize.Error
data.value: Maximum upload size must be between 12 and {0}

data.name: plFileExtensions.Help
data.value: Enter the file extensions (separated by commas) that can be uploaded to the site.

data.name: OtherSettingsError.Text
data.value: Could not update settings. Please try later.

data.name: OtherSettingsRestoreWarning.Text
data.value: Are you sure you want to cancel your changes?

data.name: BulletinsDoNotExist.Text
data.value: There are currently no Security Bulletins for DotNetNuke Platform version {0}.

data.name: BulletinsExist.Text
data.value: There are currently {0} Security Bulletins for DotNetNuke Platform version {1}:

data.name: RequestFailed_Admin.Text
data.value: Could Not Connect To {0}. You Should Verify The Source Address Is Valid And That Your Hosting Provider Has Configured Their Proxy Server Settings Correctly.

data.name: RequestFailed_User.Text
data.value: News Feed Is Not Available At This Time. Error message:

data.name: SuperUserActivityExplaination.Text
data.value: Below are the SuperUser activities. Look for suspicious activities here. Pay close attention to the Creation and Last Login Dates.

data.name: CheckDebugFailure.Text
data.value: debug设置为true - 请考虑编辑web.config并将其设置为false (或使用配置管理器)

data.name: CheckDebugReason.Text
data.value: 如果debug属性设置为true，它会影响性能，并可以揭示对黑客有用的安全异常细节

data.name: CheckDebugSuccess.Text
data.value: 不在调试模式。此设置取决于web.config文件中的调试值。

data.name: ScannerChecks.Text
data.value: 搜索文件系统和数据库

data.name: AuditExplanation.Text
data.value: 注意:系统会自动执行扫描以获取安全最佳做法

data.name: CheckTracing.Text
data.value: 跟踪设置为true - 请考虑编辑web.config并将其设置为false (或使用配置管理器)

data.name: CheckTracingReason.Text
data.value: 如果tracing属性设置为true，则允许潜在的黑客查看网站活动

data.name: CheckBiographyFailure.Text
data.value: 该领域是richtext。垃圾邮件发送者可能会在他们的传记领域中链接到他们的网站。

data.name: CheckBiographyReason.Text
data.value: 传记字段是垃圾邮件发送者的常见目标，因为他们可以添加链接/ html。在DNN 7.2.0中，这被改为多行文本框，从而消除了这种风险。

data.name: CheckRarelyUsedSuperuserFailure.Text
data.value: 我们发现一个或多个超级用户帐户在六个月内尚未登录或有活动。考虑删除它们作为最佳做法

data.name: CheckRarelyUsedSuperuserReason.Text
data.value: 超级用户帐户是最强大的DNN帐户。作为最佳做法，这些应该是有限的。

data.name: CheckRarelyUsedSuperuserSuccess.Text
data.value: 所有超级用户都是系统的常规用户。

data.name: CheckSiteRegistrationFailure.Text
data.value: 一个或多个网站正在使用公共注册

data.name: CheckSiteRegistrationReason.Text
data.value: 启用公共注册的网站是垃圾邮件发送者的主要目标。

data.name: CheckSiteRegistrationSuccess.Text
data.value: 所有网站都使用非公开注册

data.name: CheckSuperuserOldPasswordFailure.Text
data.value: 至少有一个超级用户帐户的密码在超过6个月内未被更改。

data.name: CheckSuperuserOldPasswordReason.Text
data.value: 超级用户帐户是最强大的DNN帐户。作为最佳做法，这些帐户应定期更改其密码。

data.name: CheckSuperuserOldPasswordSuccess.Text
data.value: 超级用户没有超过6个月的密码。

data.name: CheckUnexpectedExtensionsFailure.Text
data.value: 发现了一个asp或php的扩展名 - 这些可能是无害的，但有时表明一个网站已被利用，这些文件是工具。我们建议您仔细评估这些文件。

data.name: CheckUnexpectedExtensionsReason.Text
data.value: DNN是一个asp.net Web应用程序。在正常情况下，其他服务器应用程序扩展（如asp和php）不应被使用。

data.name: CheckViewstatemacReason.Text
data.value: 视图状态MAC是隐藏变量的加密版本，当页面被发送到浏览器时，页面的视图状态被持久保留。当此属性设置为true时，将检查加密的视图状态以验证它未在客户端上被篡改。

data.name: CheckViewstatemacSuccess.Text
data.value: 视图状态通过使用MAC来保护

data.name: CheckBiographyName.Text
data.value: 检查公共个人资料字段是否使用richtext

data.name: CheckRarelyUsedSuperuserName.Text
data.value: 检查超级用户帐户是否很少激活

data.name: CheckSiteRegistrationName.Text
data.value: 检查网站是否使用公开注册

data.name: CheckSuperuserOldPasswordName.Text
data.value: 检查超级用户是否不定期更改密码

data.name: CheckUnexpectedExtensionsName.Text
data.value: 检查是否找到asp / php文件

data.name: CheckDefaultPageName.Text
data.value: 检查default.aspx或default.aspx.cs文件是否已被修改

data.name: CheckDefaultPageFailure.Text
data.value: The default page(s) have been modified. We recommend you evaluate these files carefully, they may be modified by a hacker and may contain malicious code. It is best to compare these files with that from a standard install of your product. Ensure that the DNN or Evoq version of your current site matches with the standard site prior to comparison. Either remove the malicious code or restore these files from standard installation.

data.name: CheckDefaultPageReason.Text
data.value: DNN use default.aspx to load everything, so all requests will load this file when user browse the site, if someone modify this file, it may cause huge risk.

data.name: CheckDefaultPageSuccess.Text
data.value: The default.aspx and default.aspx.cs pages haven't been modified.

data.name: NoDatabaseResults.Text
data.value: Search term was not found in the database

data.name: NoFileResults.Text
data.value: Search term was not found in any files

data.name: CheckTracingFailure.Text
data.value: Tracing is enabled - this allows potential hackers to view site activity.

data.name: CheckModuleHeaderAndFooterFailure.Text
data.value: There are modules in your system that have header and footer settings, please review them to make sure no phishing code is present.

data.name: CheckModuleHeaderAndFooterName.Text
data.value: Check Modules have Header or Footer settings

data.name: CheckModuleHeaderAndFooterReason.Text
data.value: Hackers may use module's header or footer settings to inject content for phishing attacks.

data.name: CheckModuleHeaderAndFooterSuccess.Text
data.value: No modules were found that had header or footer values configured.

data.name: CheckDiskAccessName.Text
data.value: Checks extra drives/folders access permission outside the website folder

data.name: CheckDiskAccessFailure.Text
data.value: Hackers could access drives/folders outside the website

data.name: CheckDiskAccessReason.Text
data.value: The user which your website is running under has access to drives and folders outside the website location. A hacker could access these files and either read, write, or do both activities.

data.name: CheckDiskAccessSuccess.Text
data.value: Hackers cannot access drives/folders outside the website

data.name: ModifiedFilesLoadWarning.Text
data.value: Tool will enumerate all files in your system to show the recently changed files. It may take a while on a site with lots of files.

data.name: CheckPasswordFormatFailure.Text
data.value: The setting passwordFormat is not set to Hashed in web.config - consider editing web.config and setting it to Hashed (or use the configuration manager). More information can be found here.

data.name: CheckPasswordFormatReason.Text
data.value: If the value is Clear or Encrypters, hacker can retrieve password from user's password from database.

data.name: CheckPasswordFormatSuccess.Text
data.value: The passwordFormat is set as Hashed in web.config

data.name: CheckAllowableFileExtensionsFailure.Text
data.value: Either aspx, asp or php files were found in allowable file extensions setting. This will allow hackers to upload code. Remove these extensions at Settings > More > More security settings > Allowable File Extensions

data.name: CheckAllowableFileExtensionsName.Text
data.value: Check if there are any harmful extensions allowed by the file uploader

data.name: CheckAllowableFileExtensionsReason.Text
data.value: Either aspx, asp or php files were found in allowable file extensions setting. This will allow hackers to upload code. Remove these extensions at Settings > More > More security settings > Allowable File Extensions

data.name: CheckAllowableFileExtensionsSuccess.Text
data.value: The allowable file extensions is setup correctly.

data.name: CheckFileExists.Error
data.value: Current SQL Server account can execute xp_fileexist which can detect whether files exist on server.

data.name: CheckSqlRiskFailure.Text
data.value: The current SQL connection can execute dangerous command(s) on your SQL Server.

data.name: CheckSqlRiskReason.Text
data.value: If the SQL Server account isn't configured properly, it may leave risk and hackers can exploit the server by running special script.

data.name: CheckSqlRiskSuccess.Text
data.value: The SQL Server account configured correctly.

data.name: ExecuteCommand.Error
data.value: Current SQL Server account can execute xp_cmdshell which will running command line in sql server system.

data.name: GetFolderTree.Error
data.value: Current SQL Server account can execute xp_dirtree which can see the server's folders structure.

data.name: RegRead.Error
data.value: Current SQL Server account can read registry values. You need to check the permissions of xp_regread, xp_regwrite, xp_regenumkeys, xp_regenumvalues, xp_regdeletekey, xp_regdeletekey, xp_regdeletevalue, xp_instance_regread, xp_instance_regwrite, xp_instance_regenumkeys, xp_instance_regenumvalues, xp_instance_regdeletekey, xp_instance_regdeletekey, xp_instance_regdeletevalue stored procedures.

data.name: plSSLOffload.Help
data.value: 设置将检查的HTTP标头的名称，以查看网络平衡器是否使用了SSL卸载

data.name: MinPasswordLengthTitle.Help
data.value: 指示密码中的最少字符数。这只能在web.config文件中更改。

data.name: CheckHiddenSystemFilesFailure.Text
data.value: 有文件标记为系统文件或隐藏在网站文件夹中。

data.name: CheckHiddenSystemFilesReason.Text
data.value: 黑客可能会将rootkit上传到网站，将它们标记为系统文件或隐藏在文件系统中，然后在文件资源管理器中看不到这些文件。

data.name: CheckHiddenSystemFilesSuccess.Text
data.value: 没有文件标记为系统文件或隐藏在网站文件夹中。

data.name: plDisplayCopyright.Help
data.value: 选中此框可将DNN版权信用添加到页面源。

data.name: CheckTelerikVulnerabilityFailure.Text
data.value: Telerik组件漏洞尚未修补，请访问http ://www.dnnsoftware.com/community-blog/cid/155449/critical-security-update-september2017获取详细信息并下载该修补程序。

data.name: CheckTelerikVulnerabilityName.Text
data.value: 检查Telerik组件是否存在漏洞。

data.name: CheckTelerikVulnerabilityReason.Text
data.value: 核心中引用的第三方组件可能在旧版本中存在漏洞，需要进行修补。
